lines.i: Collection of information regarding the administration of medications

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.18"
SHALL conform to Consol Medications Administered Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10439)/@code="67849-0" EMS medications administered Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Medications Administered Section" (CONF:10442)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Administered (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.72)
SHALL conform to Consol Medications Administered Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10439)/@code="67849-0" EMS medications administered Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Medications Administered Section" (CONF:10442)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Administered (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.72)
